sentences.english: Once Synechococcus spp. forms bloom, its influence will be far-reaching to whole ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: 一旦形成赤潮，對整個生態系統的影響將非常深遠。

sentences.english: Phaeodactylum tricornutum is one of the harmful red tide algae.
sentences.chinese: 三角褐指藻是極具危害的赤潮藻之一。

sentences.english: No significant correlation was observed between diatom red tide and alongshore pollutants discharge.
sentences.chinese: 而近岸排污與硅藻赤潮發生的相關性不明顯。

sentences.english: Paralytic (shellfish) poisonings are one of the main red tide toxins.
sentences.chinese: 麻痹性貝毒素是其中重要的一類赤潮藻毒素。

sentences.english: The local branch of the state oceanography bureau says the number of red tides being reported each year is increasing.
sentences.chinese: 上海市海洋局說每年赤潮的次數都在增加。

sentences.english: The identification and classification of oil pollution and red tide water using the data.
sentences.chinese: 高光譜數據對赤潮及油污染水體海域的判別分類。

sentences.english: The tidal flow may trigger a spring bloom under ideal light and nutrients conditions.
sentences.chinese: 紊動在合適的光照和營養條件下能促使赤潮的形成。

sentences.english: Red tides constitute a threat against fisheries and cultivating fisheries off Zhejiang coast.
sentences.chinese: 赤潮已對浙江近海的漁業和養殖業構成嚴重威脅。

sentences.english: Harmful algal bloom (HAB) is one of the major marine disasters in the coastal areas of Hebei.
sentences.chinese: 赤潮是河北省沿海地區主要海洋生態災害之一。

sentences.english: In the midst of a full algae bloom, the waters of Kenya's Lake Magadi run red.
sentences.chinese: 赤潮氾濫，導致肯尼亞馬加迪湖水體變成紅色。

sentences.english: These nitrates contribute to the red tides of algae that often bloom along sections of China’s coastline.
sentences.chinese: 這些硝酸鹽是中國沿海部分區域產生赤潮的原因之一。

sentences.english: The findings will appear in the November issue of Harmful Algae.1, 2
sentences.chinese: 這項研究結果將刊登在十一月號的《赤潮》上。

definition: shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
lagoon/erroneously written 瀉湖|泻湖[xie4 hu2]
